Key Match Events: Charith Asalanka has been given the player of the series award.
Evin Lewis has been given the MAN OF THE MATCH AWARD!
Sri Lanka bowled decently but as the game went on, as it got tougher to grip, there were a lot of loose balls dished out.
The fielding also didn’t help and the dropped catch of Rutherford cost them dearly.
A fine chase by the Windies and they avoid a whitewash.
Lewis and Rutherford were key players in the chase.
Lewis finished the game with a six, scoring 102 off 61 balls.
Rutherford played a crucial cameo, scoring 50 off 26 balls.
Post-Match Reflections: Charith Asalanka collects the cup and celebrates with his team.
Sri Lanka will be disappointed they could not defend a decent total on a tricky surface.
